answers.answer: I was induced at 36 weeks with my first bc of toxema:/
And were you and baby ok?

I was induced at 37 weeks because of toxemia and yes me and my baby was both healthy thanks to God almighty! =] he was 6 lbs 10 ounces and now 4yrs later I am now pregnant with my second and me and baby is both healthy at 24wks and counting.
Awesome!!!!!! That's so good to hear.
Yes he was 6 lbs an a half Oz an 18 inches long.:)))

question: i have gestational diabetes as well as gestational hypertension. My doc wants to induce at 37 weeks (2 weeks from Wednesday) but when she spoke with the specialist he said he needed to think about it, I find out tomorrow when an induction will take place.Has anyone been induced at 37 weeks due to the same issues? Any stories?? Thanks!
title: Anyone experience this???
